text: Phir jab humaray qasid loot (alh-e-salam) kay pass phonchay to woh inn ki waja say ghumgeen huyey aur dil hi dil mein ranj kerney lagay. Qasidon ney kaha aap na khof khayiey na aazarda hon hum aap ko maa aap kay mutallaqeen kay bacha len gay magar aap ki biwi kay woh azab kay liye baqi reh janey walon mein say hogi
